    • Method Detail

      • isEmulator

        public static Boolean isEmulator()
        Check if the current device is an emulator

      • getUID

        public static Integer getUID(String name)
        Locate a User/Group Id based on the User/Group name.

        Android's internal Users/Groups are static and this will return an id from the RootFW internal cache UIDS.

        Applications have a specific ID/Name pattern which this method will use to re-create the Id from the name.
        Parameters:
        name - The User/Group name

      • getUIDName

        public static String getUIDName(Integer id)
        Locate a User/Group name based on the User/Group id.

        Android's internal Users/Groups are static and this will return an id from the RootFW internal cache UNAMES.

        Applications have a specific ID/Name pattern which this method will use to re-create the name from the id.
        Parameters:
        id - The User/Group Id
